entry.title: Ukraine's Military Regains Ground in Northeast
entry.content: Kharkivâ€™s regional governor said that even as Ukraine wins back territory seized by Russia in recent months, the situation across the region remains extremely volatile.

entry.title: Ukrainians in Occupied Village Learn to Live With the Enemy
entry.content: When their village was occupied by Russian soldiers, one Ukrainian family was forced into an uncomfortable intimacy with members of an army that had devastated their lives and country.
